sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import logo from "../images/logo_light.png"; const Footer = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const handleNewsletterSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert(`Merci de votre inscription : ${email}`); setEmail(''); }; return (
{/* Main Footer */}
{/* Brand Section */}
ANGEL'S BAGS
By NEFZI Malek

Des sacs uniques en perles et cristal, faits main avec passion. Chaque pièce est une œuvre d'art créée pour illuminer votre quotidien.

{/* Social Links */}
{['Facebook', 'Instagram', 'TikTok', 'Pinterest'].map((social) => ( ))}
{/* Navigation Links */}

Navigation

    {[ { to: '/', label: 'Accueil' }, { to: '/categories', label: 'Catégories' }, { to: '/products', label: 'Tous les Produits' }, { to: '/about', label: 'À Propos' }, { to: '/contact', label: 'Contact' } ].map((link) => (
  • {link.label}
    • ))}
{/* Categories */}

Nos Collections

    {[ { to: '/categories/sacs-perles', label: 'Sacs en Perles' }, { to: '/categories/sacs-cristal', label: 'Sacs en Cristal' }, { to: '/categories/nouveautes', label: 'Nouveautés' }, { to: '/categories/personnalisables', label: 'Personnalisables' } ].map((link) => (
  • {link.label}
    • ))}
{/* Contact & Newsletter */}

Restons Connectés

{/* Contact Info */}
contact@angels-bags.com
+216 46 535 386
La Mannouba, Tunis
{/* Newsletter */}

Inscrivez-vous à notre newsletter

setEmail(e.target.value)} placeholder="Votre email" required className="flex-grow px-4 py-2.5 bg-angel-gold/10 border border-angel-border rounded-l-full focus:outline-none focus:border-angel-gold text-white placeholder-angel-border text-sm" />
{/* Bottom Bar */}
© {new Date().getFullYear()} Angels_Bags. Tous droits réservés.
Confidentialité CGV Retours & Échanges Plan du site
); }; export default Footer;
